summary: 2002 TOYOTA SEQUOIA, TRANSMISSION FAILURE, LOCAL REPAIR SHOP GOT TRANSMISSION TO WORK, SAYS IT WILL FAIL AGAIN SOON AND RECOMMENDED THE TOYOTA DEALERSHIP REPLACE IT.  THE TOYOTA DEALERSHIP DENIED THERE WAS ANY PROBLEM WITH OUR VEHICLE.  A QUICK GOOGLE SEARCH SHOWS THAT THERE ARE WIDESPREAD AND DOCUMENTED PROBLEMS WITH '00 TO '02 TOYOTA SEQUOIA/TUNDRA TRANSMISSION FAILURES. *TR
